item.title: 欧盟准备与美国讨论降低汽车关税，贸易负责人称
item.description: 欧盟最高贸易官员周三在华盛顿表示，欧盟准备讨论削减汽车和其他商品的关税，以避免与美国爆发贸易战。【原文：The European Union is ready to discuss cutting tariffs on autos and other goods as it seeks to head off a trade war with the US, the bloc’s top trade official said Wednesday in Washington.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要显示官员将按兵不动直至通胀改善
item.description: 美联储官员在 1 月份表示，他们准备在通胀顽固和经济政策不确定的情况下保持利率稳定。【原文：Federal Reserve officials in January expressed their readiness to hold interest rates steady amid stubborn inflation and economic policy uncertainty.】

item.title: 可可短缺引发贸易商与科特迪瓦托运人之间的纠纷
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，可可短缺正在引发象牙海岸最大生产国的当地出口商与全球最大的两家贸易商之间的裂痕。【原文：A cocoa shortfall is spurring a rift between local exporters in top producer Ivory Coast and two of the world’s biggest traders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 投资者是否过于看空？我们即将揭晓
item.description: 一项备受关注的调查显示，个人投资者的看跌情绪是 2023 年底以来最严重的。也许是对通胀、裁员和关税的担忧一并涌上心头。【原文：According to a highly-regarded survey, individual investors are the most bearish they’ve been since late 2023. Perhaps worries about inflation, job cuts, and tariffs are all sinking in at once.】

item.title: 哈维尔-米莱的加密货币丑闻导致 86% 的交易者蒙受损失
item.description: 据研究公司南森（Nansen）称，上周五，在阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）认可的一种memecoin上建仓的加密货币交易者中，估计有86%最终亏损。【原文：An estimated 86% of crypto traders that took positions in a memecoin endorsed by Argentine President Javier Milei on Friday ended up losing money, according to research firm Nansen.】

item.title: 开发商斥资 2200 万美元购入亚利桑那州地块，押注数据中心建设
item.description: 亚利桑那州土地咨询公司（Arizona Land Consulting）在该州抢购了 160 英亩土地，以扩大对数据中心繁荣的投资。【原文：Arizona Land Consulting snapped up 160 acres in the state as it expands its bet on the data-center boom.】

item.title: Saylor 战略为 20 亿美元可转换债券提供优惠条件
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的战略公司正在为其拟发行的 20 亿美元可转换债券向投资者提供更优惠的条件。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy is offering investors sweeter terms for its proposed $2 billion issue of convertible debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Ecopetrol 加大对哥伦比亚石油资源丰富的东部平原的投资力度
item.description: 国家控制的石油钻探公司 Ecopetrol SA 认为，在哥伦比亚的原油生产中心地带进行开发和勘探具有 "巨大潜力"，同时还将赌注押在了美国的压裂技术和近海天然气上。【原文：State-controlled oil driller Ecopetrol SA sees “great potential” for development and exploration in Colombia’s crude-producing heartland alongside bets on US fracking and offshore gas.】

item.title: 力拓追随大型矿业同行利润下滑
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）成为最新一家年度利润下滑的矿业巨头，原因是该行业正努力应对其最大客户中国的需求疲软。【原文：Rio Tinto Group became the latest mining major to post a slide in annual profit as the industry grapples with weaker demand from its top customer China.】

item.title: 商务部将下令大规模解雇芯片和人工智能工作人员
item.description: 作为唐纳德-特朗普总统对联邦政府大刀阔斧削减政策的一部分，商务部下属的国家标准与技术研究院（National Institute of Standards and Technology）正准备解雇多达约 500 名试用期员工。【原文：The National Institute of Standards and Technology, a lab housed under the Commerce Department, is preparing to fire as many as roughly 500 probationary staffers as part of President Donald Trump’s sweeping cuts to the federal government.】

item.title: 特朗普将终止批准纽约拥堵定价法案
item.description: 特朗普政府正着手阻止纽约市的交通拥堵收费计划，推翻了去年获得的联邦批准，很可能会就收费举措展开一场法律对决。【原文：The Trump administration is moving to block New York City’s congestion pricing program, reversing a federal approval granted last year and likely setting up a legal showdown over the tolling initiative.】

item.title: 美国正式指定贩毒集团为恐怖组织
item.description: 美国国务院根据唐纳德-特朗普总统在上任第一天签署的行政命令，将在拉丁美洲活动的八个卡特尔组织定为恐怖组织。【原文：The US State Department designated eight cartels operating in Latin America as terrorist organizations, following an executive order President Donald Trump signed during his first day in office.】

item.title: 在特朗普加征关税之前，洛杉矶港口一月份创下历史新高
item.description: 这个美国最繁忙的贸易中心上个月的集装箱运输量超过了以往任何一个一月，因为进口商们赶在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普广泛预期的关税上调之前运入货物。【原文：The busiest trade hub in the US moved more containers last month than in any previous January, as importers rushed to bring in goods before widely anticipated tariff hikes from President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 瑞典官员称欧盟关税对策必须符合世贸组织规定
item.description: 据瑞典贸易部长称，欧盟将确保对美国关税的任何回应都必须符合世界贸易组织的规则，这可能会限制欧盟的报复选择。【原文：The European Union will make sure that any response to US tariffs must be compliant with World Trade Organization rules, according to Sweden’s trade minister, potentially limiting the bloc’s options to retaliate.】

item.title: 南非百亿美元税收计划破坏预算，激怒联盟
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）提出了一项令人震惊的消费税上调方案，以帮助控制政府债务，但此举遭到了联合政府中其他党派的反对，并使预算案的公布受阻。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana proposed a shock consumption-tax increase to help rein in government debt, but the move was rejected by other parties in the nation’s coalition government and derailed the unveiling of the budget.】

item.title: 西门子出让医疗业务部门西门子医疗集团 2% 的股份
item.description: 西门子股份公司将出售其 2018 年上市的医疗技术部门西门子医疗股份公司（Siemens Healthineers AG）约 2% 的股份。【原文：Siemens AG is offering a roughly 2% stake in Siemens Healthineers AG, the medical technology unit it listed in 2018.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）会议使 4iG 在卫星交易上的赌注创下新高
item.description: 匈牙利 4iG Nyrt.公司的股价跃升至历史新高，原因是该电信公司可能正准备与埃隆-马斯克的太空探索技术公司（Space Exploration Technologies Corp.【原文：Shares in Hungary’s 4iG Nyrt. jumped to a record high on bets the telecommunications company could be preparing a business deal with Elon Musk’s Space Exploration Technologies Corp.】

item.title: 因增税而停滞不前的南非预算要点
item.description: 自 1994 年白人少数统治结束以来，南非的年度预算首次因执政联盟的分歧而被推迟。【原文：For the first time since the end of white-minority rule in 1994, South Africa’s annual budget was postponed because of divisions in the governing coalition.】

item.title: 反垄断专家乔恩-奥尔萨格（Jon Orszag）成立新公司，押注并购迷局
item.description: 经济咨询公司 Compass Lexecon 的联合创始人乔纳森-奥尔萨格（Jonathan Orszag）正在下一个新的赌注：并购只会变得更加复杂。【原文：Jonathan Orszag, the co-founder of economic consulting firm Compass Lexecon, is making a fresh bet that mergers and acquisitions are only going to get more complicated.】

item.title: 间谍软件丑闻在意大利爆发 以色列公司成为丑闻中心
item.description: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基。摄影师：亚历克斯-克劳斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Volodymyr Zelenskiy, Ukraine's president. Photographer: Alex Kraus/Bloomberg】

item.title: 日本央行的鹰派立场有望刺激对美国企业债券的需求
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，日本央行的加息应有助于降低日本投资者的货币保护成本，刺激他们对美国投资级公司债券的兴趣。【原文：Interest rate hikes from the Bank of Japan should help cut currency protection costs for Japanese investors, spurring their appetite for US investment-grade corporate bonds, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 特朗普的政策洪流导致石油市场瘫痪
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普再次成为美国总统后，石油市场对他试图做出的一系列改变越来越麻木。【原文：The oil market is becoming increasingly numb to the array of changes that Donald Trump is trying to make now that he’s US President again.】

item.title: SolarEdge 攀升 40%，收入超预期引发空头回补
item.description: 太阳能设备制造商 SolarEdge Technologies Inc. 的销售额超过预期，引发明显的空头回补反弹，盘中涨幅高达 40%，创下历史最大涨幅。【原文：SolarEdge Technologies Inc. soared as much as 40% for the biggest intraday gain on record after the solar-equipment maker surpassed sales forecasts, triggering an apparent short-covering rally.】

item.title: 苹果公司推出售价 599 美元的新款 iPhone 16e，以期重振增长势头
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Apple Inc. introduced a new low-end smartphone called the iPhone 16e priced at $599, aiming to revive growth after a sluggish holiday season.】

item.title: 瑞士力争在 2026 年初与欧盟签署协议
item.description: 瑞士的目标是在明年初与欧盟签署一项协议，以确保瑞士能够进入欧盟单一市场，而可能举行的公民投票仍迫在眉睫。【原文：Switzerland aims to sign a deal with the European Union to secure its access to the bloc’s single market early next year, with a possible plebiscite still looming.】

item.title: 维克托-什韦茨谈《政府支出报告》在美国政府支出问题上的错误之处
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。今天，我们将为您带来麦格理资本（Macquarie Capital）全球服务台战略主管 Viktor Shvets 的观点。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.Today, we’re bringing you thoughts from Viktor Shvets, Head of Global Desk Strategy at Macquarie Capital and a favorite Od】

item.title: 微软首次推出可创建视频游戏场景的人工智能生成器
item.description:
通过 Xbox 数据的培训，New Muse 模式对于希望削减成本的游戏工作室来说是一个潜在的福音。【原文：

Trained on Xbox data, the New Muse model could be a potential boon for game studios looking to cut costs.

】

item.title: 阿里巴巴因看好人工智能而实现 1,100 亿美元的增长面临盈利考验
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）在 DeepSeek 引发的涨势为其市值增加超过 1100 亿美元后，将在周四的财报中面临关键考验。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. faces a key test in its earnings presentation Thursday after a DeepSeek-sparked rally added more than $110 billion to its market value.】

item.title: 微软发布面向未来数据中心的量子计算芯片
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp.）发布了其首款量子计算芯片，这是该公司在努力生产有朝一日可能解决现代计算机所无法解决的问题的设备方面迈出的重要一步。【原文：Microsoft Corp. announced its first quantum computing chip, a major step in the company’s effort to produce devices that might someday solve problems beyond the reach of modern computers.】

item.title: Binance.US 恢复通过银行转账在平台上使用美元
item.description: Binance.US表示，其客户很快就能在该加密货币交易所存取美元，这是近两年来的第一次。【原文：Binance.US said its customers will soon be able to deposit and withdraw US dollars on the crypto exchange for the first time in almost two years.】
